attributes.additional_details: This campaign is important because not many people know much about Human Trafficking. Most  people think that Human Trafficking is  the same as slavery.It is also important because people who are victims of this issue  don't ask for help because they feel ashamed of themselves.
attributes.background: We are campaigning to the government to do more to stop Human Trafficking.Current laws are not doing enough to stop the issue. We want to see the government invest more money and stopping this issue.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
